name: UFGProductionIndicatorInstanceComponent
comment: Instanced production indicator, used on factories instead of the old non instanced variant.

methods.name: OnProductionStatusChanged
methods.comment: Called when the buildings indicator status changes.

methods.name: ResetIndicatorStatus
methods.comment: This sets the cached status to IS_NONE so that an update is forced next frame

properties.name: mOuterFactory
properties.comment: The outer factory we should display the state for.

properties.name: mCachedIndicatorStatus
properties.comment: Save the state of the factory so that we don't change material excessively.

properties.name: mInstanceHandle
properties.comment: Only used for holding info about where the instance is located, for quicker changes.

properties.name: mInstanceManager
properties.comment: Don't need to be a UPROPERTY as it's only meant as a shortcut to an object that is already managed elsewhere and guaranteed to live longer than this component.
